data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 30,685 lost in Ntungamo that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ntungamo, Uganda
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Ntungamo. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 15,215 believers in the state of Ntungamo the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Ntungamo. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Nubian people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, for those in trouble in the state of Ntungamo prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Ntungamo, Uganda and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ntungamo, Uganda has a population of 45,900.

We estimate Ntungamo has 15,215 people who might know Jesus, 22,921 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 7,764 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Ntungamo.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

location.name: Ntungamo
location.people_groups_list: Meneng, Plains Bira, Chinese, general, Mvuba, Amba
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Meneng (7,800), Plains Bira (2,000), Chinese, general (19,000), Mvuba (1,200), Amba (54,000)
